data.text: @NEILMAHONEY Skier, Astronaut, British Car enthusiast... I can only think of one other character with as long and varied a career. https://t.co/CKswxd8lmc
@NEILMAHONEY I remember watching the older ones when I was a kid too and think I saw all of them up to the first Craig movie but dont remember most of them. Maybe I should check 'em out again.
@NEILMAHONEY You should start a new James Bond podcast: For Your Ears Mahonly.
@NEILMAHONEY neither did anyone in the JAWS movies
